content.body: hober: Feedback to your "Microdata should remain on the REC track" arguments here - http://www.w3.org/html/wg/wiki/User:Eoconnor/Microdata_should_remain_on_the_REC_track (some information added that you probably were not aware of)
hober: If you plan to wipe my comments from the wiki, please let me know so I can move them elsewhere.
